title: Pset_PipeConnectionFlanged
description: This property set is used to define the specifics of a flanged pipe connection used between occurrences of pipe segments and fittings.

FlangeTable.title: FlangeTable
FlangeTable.description: Designation of the standard table to which the flange conforms.

FlangeStandard.title: FlangeStandard
FlangeStandard.description: Designation of the standard describing the flange table.

BoreSize.title: BoreSize
BoreSize.description: The nominal bore of the pipe flange.

FlangeThickness.title: FlangeThickness
FlangeThickness.description: Thickness of the material from which the pipe bend is constructed.

NumberOfBoltholes.title: NumberOfBoltholes
NumberOfBoltholes.description: Number of boltholes in the flange.

BoltSize.title: BoltSize
BoltSize.description: Size of the bolts securing the flange.

BoltholePitch.title: BoltholePitch
BoltholePitch.description: Diameter of the circle along which the boltholes are placed.
